game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the Lost City of Eldarath
game.description: Quest description: Rumors have been circulating about a hidden city deep in the forest, filled with treasures and artifacts. Your quest is to find and recover an ancient relic said to be concealed within the city's walls.
game.reward: 1000 Gold Pieces, The Amulet of Light

task.objective: Gather information about the Lost City's location.
task.description: Talk to Oakwood Village residents for clues on the city's whereabouts.

task.objective: Acquire a map of the forest leading to the Lost City.
task.description: Inquire with the local cartographer for a detailed map to navigate through the woods.

task.objective: Pass through the Eldarath Forest and reach the Lost City.
task.description: Follow the map and be cautious of potential dangers.

task.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the city's temple.
task.description: Battle any guardians or overcome obstacles to claim the relic inside the temple.
